documents.document:
Masters of Business Administration (I.T) Course at PCS India

Masters of Business Administration (I.T)

INTRODUCTION

With the expanded use of information technology in all facets of business, including outsourcing, and ecommerce, the IT and ITESS Sectors in India have seen tremendous growth in the past decade. Indian Engineers and IT Professionals employed by India's best and biggest IT Companies, today work across the world, servicing Fortune 500 clients at the cutting edge of Information Technology.

OBJECTIVE

This MBA in Information Technology Management is designed to help you develop the skills you need to enhance business competitiveness and interact effectively with executive management as a strategic business partner. People who choose this specialization are often employed in entry to mid level positions in IT / Technical / Managerial functions in the IT/ITESS Sector.

INSTRUCTIONAL SYSTEM

* Each student shall get an SLM (Self Learning Material) Course Package at the beginning of the Course. These SLM's shall serve as a guide for self study.

* Students get access to a feature rich Online Learning Management System,with Recorded Video Lecture’s and other e learning content for the duration of the Program.

* Students shall have access to regular Counseling & Teaching Sessions conducted by institute’s faculty, delivered using a Live Virtual Classroom Platform.

ELIGIBILITY

* Candidates who have passed any Bachelor's degree of a recognized University with 50 % marks in the aggregate. OR

* A graduate with at least 3 years Full Time experience in IT Industry, in a Managerial / Supervisory / Professional Role, after their graduation (Three years Full-Time experience shall be determined as on 1st August of the year of admission).

DURATION

Two Years - Four Semesters

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

MBA (Entrepreneurship & Small Business Management &

MBA (Entrepreneurship and Small Business Management and Strategy)

INTRODUCTION

In this program, students will evaluate the theories and practices related to the start up development and management of a new business, product, or service. Students will explore entrepreneurial attributes while discovering the practical knowledge, strategy, and skills needed to create a viable business plan. Students learn how to create a plan that attracts financial and leadership support by internal and external stakeholders needed to achieve success.

OBJECTIVE

The program will help the students develop the skills required to evaluate business opportunities, create new ventures, and foster innovation. Additionally, it will hone your problem-solving and decision-making skills and explore the differences between managing start-ups versus large organizations. Analyze organizational development theories and change models currently being employed in organizations.

INSTRUCTIONAL SYSTEM

* Each student shall get an SLM (Self Learning Material) Course Package at the beginning of the Course. These SLM's shall serve as a guide for self study.

* Students get access to a feature rich Online Learning Management System,with Recorded Video Lecture’s and other e learning content for the duration of the Program.

* Students shall have access to regular Counseling & Teaching Sessions conducted by institute’s faculty, delivered using a Live Virtual Classroom Platform.

ELIGIBILITY

* Candidates who have passed any Bachelor's degree of a recognized University with 50 % marks in the aggregate. OR

* A Graduate who has at least 3 years Full Time experience in a Managerial / Supervisory / Professional Role, after their graduation (Three years Full-Time experience shall be determined as on 1st August of the year of admission).

DURATION

Two Years - Four Semesters

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

M.A. (Economics) Through Correspondence at PCS India

M.A. (Economics)

INTRODUCTION

The M.A. Degree Programme provides an opportunity to acquire advanced knowledge in the main areas of Economics and current affairs in the field related to Finance, Budget and Accounting.

OBJECTIVE

The Post Graduate Degree Programme M.A. (Economics), provides an opportunity to acquire in-depth knowledge of advanced economic theories with a view to develop analytical skills for applying these theories to current economic problems in India and abroad.

ELIGIBILITY

A candidate who has graduated from the faculty of Arts, Social Sciences, Commerce, Science and Computer Science (with the background of Mathematics and Statistics), Engineering, Law, Management, Agriculture of this University or any other recognized University is eligible for admission to this Programme.

DURATION

2 Years

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

Masters of Law Through Correspondence at PCS India

Masters of Law

INTRODUCTION

Legal education has a very crucial role to play in development of the law as a humanitical profession since it is an educational process which equips the future lawyer, judge administer, counselor and legal scientist to fashion and refashion ways of peaceful and ordered attainment of ideals of human governance on the one hand and democratic right on the other

OBJECTIVE

The LL.M Programme is a post graduate study in select areas in legal advanced education.

STRUCTURE

The structure of Programme is based on guidelines of the UGC and the academic conventions in the University. The areas selected are:
Group A Human Rights &
Group B Business Laws.

Note:

* The Student may choose either Group A or B for pursuing the LLM Course

* Group once selected cannot be altered under any circumstances

ELIGIBILITY

The candidate who has LL.B degree course of 3 years / 5 years duration of this University or any other recognized University will be held eligible for admission.

DURATION

The duration of the Programme is of 2 academic years.

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

M.A. (English) Through Correspondence at PCS India

M.A. (English)

INTRODUCTION

The M.A. Degree Programme provides an opportunity to acquire advanced knowledge in the main areas of English literature and language.

OBJECTIVE

The objectives of the programme are to develop experts in English language and literature; to help advance literary sensibility and critical judgment; to develop linguistic abilities; compositional and communicative skills and to train students in independent use of tools of learning, i.e. study and reference skills.

ELIGIBILITY

A student who has passed B.A. Degree examination with Special / Entire English of this University or any other recognized University shall be admitted to M.A. Programme.

DURATION

2 Years

Masters in Business Administration (3 Years) Course

Masters in Business Administration (3 Years)

INTRODUCTION

Management is not only about solving structured problems efficiently and effectively but also about the challenge of transforming a situation into an opportunity in an ever-changing competitive environment in the era of globalization and further, handling human problems in real life to synergize the team effort. Masters in Business administration equips the students and managers with skills to meet the challenges and opportunities of the corporate world. It strengthens the leadership capabilities of students. The learning model provides transformational experience that fosters professional, intellectual, and personal development. It is designed to provide a unique, market-relevant combination of a comprehensive business education with real-world applications

SPECIALIZATIONS

* Human Resource Management

* Information Technology

* Marketing Management

* Finance Management

ELIGIBILITY

Bachelor Degree in any Discipline from a recognised University, and Marks / Percentile Score in the Entrance Examination namely CAT / MAT / ATMA / JM ET / SNAP / XAT / ENAT.

DURATION

* Minimum 3 years

* Maximum 6 years

Course Structure:

* On successful completion of first and second semester, student shall be awarded Diploma in Management

* On successful completion of first and second third, and fourth semester, student shall be awarded Post Graduate Diploma in Management

* On successful completion of all the six semesters student shall be awarded Master of Business Administration.

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

M.A. (Sociology) Through Correspondence at PCS India

M.A. (Sociology)

INTRODUCTION

The Master of Sociology M.A. (Sociology) program objective is to help students develop professionally by employing analytical and research skills through the use of research methods, research experience, and analytical skills necessary for the employment in government, nonprofit, and corporate organizations.

OBJECTIVE

The study of stratification of societies constitutes one of the most critical and important areas within sociology. The objective is to familiarize the student with both theoretical formulations made and empirical studies undertaken by sociologists classical and contemporary.

ELIGIBILITY

Bachelor Degree in Arts, Commerce, Science( with background of mathematics and Statistics), Engineering, Law Managememt , Agriculture from any recognized University

DURATION

2 Years

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in

Master of Journalism and Mass Communication

INTRODUCTION

A diverse and intensive program is relevant for students planning a career in public relations and promotion, institutional relations, information services, technical writing, newspaper and magazine journalism or radio and video production, or journalism.

OBJECTIVE

The program is geared towards realizing the following objectives:

* To provide intensive theoretical and practical knowledge in various media professions ranging from the management of media organization to research.

* To provide an integrated perspective of media functioning along with a fair amount of exposure to technical knowhow.

DURATION

Masters of Computer Applications Course at PCS India

Masters of Computer Applications

INTRODUCTION

As today's companies face increasingly important technology and management decisions, demand for IT professionals with Master degrees is expected to continue to grow. Our Masters in Computer Applications is an innovative, recognized masters program carefully designed to help towards the growth of the organization.

FOCUS

This course will help them in gaining knowledge in Information Technology and applying that in their organization. The MCA program focuses on providing a sound theoretical background as well as good practical exposure to students in the field of Information Technology. It is focussed towards a modern, industry-oriented education in applied computer science. It aims at producing skilled professionals who can successfully meet the demands of the organisation in information technology industry.

ELIGIBILITY

Bachelor Degree in any Discipline from a recognised University, and marks / Percentile Score in the Entrance Examination namely ENAT or any other state level / national level entrance exam.

DURATION

3 Years (Six Semesters)

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

Masters of Library and Information Science Course

Masters of Library and Information Science

INTRODUCTION

The Master of Library and Information Science program objective is to help students to gain knowledge in the field of Library Information Science. Now a days there are lot of Online Libraries and to manage those and get required information for the students which will be helpful in their career.

OBJECTIVE

The Master of Library and Information Science (M.Lib. &amp; I.Sc.) Programme is meant to impart high level skills and training necessary for higher positions in Library and Information Centres.

ELIGIBILITY

Any student who has successfully completed and passed the Bachelor of Library and Information Science of any recognized University can apply for admission to M.Lib. &amp; I.Sc. Programme.

Contact: Delhi -9810772332

Post Graduate Diploma in Fire Protection and Safety

Post Graduate Diploma in Fire Protection and Safety

INTRODUCTION

Technical changes within industry and the increase in the number, variety, type of chemicals, flammable and combustible products and population densities have accentuated the complex fire problems. Such demands have created a need of constant research and development to come out with customized scientific solutions. In fact a specialised training based on latest theories in fire protection including various aspects pertaining to design, installation, commissioning and maintenance of fire protection systems is the need of the hour. This in totality requires a special branch of engineering in its own right.

Safety is connected with the lives and property of people and the general situation of reform, development and stability. Safety training in its proper application can dramatically reduce maintenance costs, increase safety performance, prevent loss of time and accidents and enhance productivity. Many safety professionals work in manufacturing and production operation to ensure that working conditions & methods are safe for employees.

POTENTIAL CAREERS

Career opportunities in this field are on the rise. Jobs are open in the government sector, private, industrial & the service sector. In fact consultancy opportunities are also open to aspiring candidates. In the private sector, insurance, manufacturing firms, chemical & petrochemical firms, public utilities and educational complexes, airports, five star hotels etc, employ candidates from this field.

ELIGIBILITY

Engineering Graduates OR

Diploma Holders with three years experience.

DURATION

1 Year (2 Semester)

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

Bachelor of Business Administration

Bachelor of Business Administration

INTRODUCTION

A Bachelor of Business Administration is a three-year degree program that provides a fundamental education in business and management principles. It also enables students to elect advanced courses in a particular concentration area such as finance, computer information systems, real estate, marketing or accounting. The Bachelor of Business Administration degree offers a solid academic foundation and practical management training that provides students with tools to successfully navigate a large or small organization or a career in the public sector.

SKILLS ACQUIRED

Through the BBA curriculum students learn business practices, accounting and finance, business analysis, management, marketing, effective communication, quantitative reasoning and information technologies. Graduates of a Bachelor of Business Administration program gain knowledge of business practices and processes, understand the role of economics in the world marketplace and possess an awareness of global business issues.

BENEFITS

BBA graduates are highly employable and often advance to upper levels of business management. Employers seek business administration graduates for a broad range of positions from business manager and sales representative, to human resource manager and project planner.

INSTRUCTIONAL SYSTEM

Each student shall get an SLM (Self Learning Material) Course Package at the beginning of the Course. These SLM's shall serve as a guide for self study.
Students get access to a feature rich Online Learning Management System,with Recorded Video Lecture’s and other e learning content for the duration of the Program.
Students shall have access to regular Counseling &amp;amp; Teaching Sessions conducted by institute’s faculty, delivered using a Live Virtual Classroom Platform.

ELIGIBILITY

Candidates who have passed XII Std. from any branch with minimum 45% marks

DURATION

The Program Duration for BBA will be Three Years comprising of Six Semesters, Students may choose to take breaks in between subjects/semesters. However, they are expected to follow a Normative period of six years i.e Students will have to complete the program within six years from session start date.

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

Bachelor of Computer Applications

Bachelor of Computer Applications

INTRODUCTION

Information technology has become an integral part of modern contemporary society. Life devoid of the knowledge of information technology appears to be gloomy. Information technology has been extended to all the new areas, making its way from making its way from mathematical computation and data processing via office automation to electronic sectors. IT is becoming so prominent that it is changing every aspect of human life Trade, commerce, communication, manufacturing, service sector, entertainment, education and Global security. In fact, our national agenda for Governance has identified information Technology as one area where India can quickly establish Global dominance.

OBJECTIVE

Considering the enormous importance being laid to IT sector, Bachelor of Computer Application course has been designed for the benefit of to be IT giants. This will help the students to make their career in the field of Information Technology

INSTRUCTIONAL SYSTEM

Each student shall get an SLM (Self Learning Material) Course Package at the beginning of the Course. These SLM's shall serve as a guide for self study.
Students get access to a feature rich Online Learning Management System,with Recorded Video Lecture’s and other e learning content for the duration of the Program.
Students shall have access to regular Counseling & Teaching Sessions conducted by institute’s faculty, delivered using a Live Virtual Classroom Platform.

ELIGIBILITY

Candidates who have passed XII Std./HSc from any Stream

DURATION

The Program Duration for BCA will be Three Years comprising of Six Semesters, Students may choose to take breaks in between subjects/semesters.However ,they are expected to follow a Normative period of six years i.e. Students will have to complete the program within six years from session start date

For further details:

contact@pcsindia.in

Library is a must for each Institution and even the concept of online Libraries are becoming very popular to access a lot of material online.

The main objective of BLIS course is to make a student competent with basic information skills, both traditional and modern.

Corporate Diploma in Business Administration

Corporate Diploma in Business Administration

INTRODUCTION

MITSDE offers various Post Graduate programs and which are extremely popular and widely accepted by working professionals. MITSDE also has programs specially designed for corporates, developed with an objective of meeting the challenges faced by working population. The C-PGDBA is one such program developed for corporate students in order to provide an excellent opportunity to pursue/enhance a management career.

REQUIREMENTS

Training will be provided at your end but minimum no of students should be at least 15. There would be 10 Personal Contact Programs.

FOCUS AREA

Marketing Management
Managerial Finance
Human Resources Management
Technology and Operations Management
Entrepreneurship

ELIGIBILITY

12th Std (in any discipline) and above

Diploma in Business Administration

Diploma in Business Administration

INTRODUCTION

Management is not only about solving structured problems efficiently and effectively but also about the challenge of transforming a situation into an opportunity in an ever-changing competitive environment in the era of globalization and further, handling human problems in real life to synergize the team effort.

Diploma in Business administration equips the students and managers with skills to meet the challenges and opportunities of the corporate world. The greatest advantage of this course is that even undergraduate students can admit to it. Thus you can take course while studying for your degree course. This can prove a value addition to your degree and hence make your job search easy.

It strengthens the leadership capabilities of students. The learning model provides transformational experience that fosters professional, intellectual, and personal development. It is designed to provide a unique, market-relevant combination of a comprehensive business education with real-world applications.

POTENTIAL CAREERS

You can be easily absorbed at the entry level or junior executive level in private as well as government sector. The learning acquired through this course would make your performance and career growth hassle-free. You can outshine exposing your broad range of duties in every sector of the operations. There are many opportunities in the field of management, marketing, healthcare management and human resource management.

ELIGIBILITY

12th Std passed or equivalent (in any discipline).

DURATION

1 Year (2 Semester)

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html

Diploma in Retail Management

Diploma in Retail Management

INTRODUCTION

The booming retail industry has become a well-known phenomenon as it has spread its branches throughout almost all parts of the country. Ranked as the fifth most attractive, emerging retail market in the world, India is considered as a potential market for local as well as global industries.

Retail companies are badly in need of skilled and sophisticated staff for their daily business operations in order to make most out this booming industry. In order to fulfill this requirement, we have specially designed this course for in Retail Management with an exclusive aim of imparting the job-oriented skills and knowledge and make them properly trained Retail staff with great professionalism and innovative skills.

POTENTIAL CAREERS

After successful completion of this course, one can have an opportunity to work for Retail industry in its departments like customer relations and sales; retail safety and security; point-of-sale procedures; stock control; retail industry analysis; merchandising; food handling; beverage product knowledge; work practices and communication; customer relations and sales; retail safety and security; and food preparation. This course will certainly help people with minimal qualification to grab such jobs opportunities.

ELIGIBILITY

12th Std passed or equivalent (in any discipline).

DURATION

1 Year (2 Semester)

For further details:
Contact: Delhi -9810772332
contact@pcsindia.in
URL: http://www.pcsindia.in/allcourse.html
